title: How much in professional taxes should one pay? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello Ms. Saloni Das, The maximum amount payable per year is INR 2,500 and in line with tax payer's salary there are predetermined slabs. In India, professional tax is imposed at the state level. However, not all states impose this tax. so you are required to check first whether your state impose the professional tax or not.

No more professional tax which is replaced by GST wef 1st July 2017 Tax rates vary according to type of profession.More over total income from profession upto 20L (10L in some states) is not taxable under GST
